snippet: Tracie Bennett, a British theater veteran, makes her Broadway debut in “End of the Rainbow” playing the daunting role of Judy Garland six months before her death.
abstract: British theater veteran Tracie Bennett makes her Broadway debut in End of the Rainbow, playing the daunting role of Judy Garland six months before her death; actress is protective of the troubled film star, saying she was preoccupied with illuminating and honoring 'the essence of Garland' for fans who might have been weary of her performance.
lead_paragraph: Tracie Bennett, a British theater veteran, makes her Broadway debut in “End of the Rainbow” playing the daunting role of Judy Garland six months before her death.

headline.seo: Tracie Bennett as Judy Garland in ‘End of the Rainbow’
headline.main: To Play Judy, Sing Till It Hurts and Be Fearless
headline.print_headline: To Play Judy, Sing Till It Hurts And Be Fearless
